entities.createSql: CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`book_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `dua_global_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ID` TEXT NOT NULL, `dua_segment_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `top` TEXT, `arabic_diacless` TEXT, `arabic` TEXT, `transliteration` TEXT, `translations` TEXT, `bottom` TEXT, `reference` TEXT, `app_reference` TEXT, `pid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`dua_global_id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `book_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `chap_id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `dua_id` TEXT, `chapname` TEXT, `duaname` TEXT NOT NULL, `tags` TEXT, `ID` TEXT NOT NULL, `category` TEXT NOT NULL, `fav` INTEGER NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `title` TEXT NOT NULL, `summary` TEXT NOT NULL, `details` TEXT NOT NULL, `ref` TEXT, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rootarabic` TEXT NOT NULL, `rootbuckwater` TEXT NOT NULL, `definition` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `name` TEXT NOT NULL, `name_english` TEXT NOT NULL, `audiotype` INTEGER NOT NULL, `url` TEXT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title` TEXT NOT NULL, `summary` TEXT NOT NULL, `versesrange` TEXT NOT NULL, `surahid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`title` TEXT NOT NULL, `ayahref` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`id` INTEGER NOT NULL, `arabic` TEXT NOT NULL, `trans` TEXT NOT NULL, `meaning` TEXT NOT NULL, PRIMARY KEY(`id`))
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `status` INTEGER NOT NULL, `text` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `objectpronoun` TEXT, `comment` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`harf` TEXT NOT NULL, `worddetails` TEXT, `detailsrules` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rootword` TEXT NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `parentid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `definition` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `rootarabic` TEXT NOT NULL, `rootbuckwater` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)
CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`rootword` TEXT NOT NULL, `word` TEXT NOT NULL, `parentid` INTEGER NOT NULL, `definition` TEXT NOT NULL, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `surahname` TEXT NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `rootword` TEXT NOT NULL, `hansweir` TEXT, `arabicword` TEXT NOT NULL, `ur_lughat` TEXT NOT NULL, `meaning` TEXT NOT NULL, `letter` TEXT NOT NULL, `en_lughat` TEXT NOT NULL, `comments` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `harfwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismstartwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismendwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarstartwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarendwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `mahdoof` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `shartindexstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `shartindexend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `jawabshartindexstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `jawabshartindexend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `harfwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `shartstatwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `shartendwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `jawabstartwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `jawabendwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `indexend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarstart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismkanastart` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismkanaend` INTEGER NOT NULL, `harfwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismwordo` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ismendword` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarstartwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `khabarendwordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `mahdoof` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `startindex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `endindex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordfrom` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordto` INTEGER NOT NULL, `disconnected` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `startindex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `endindex` INTEGER NOT NULL, `phrasetype` TEXT NOT NULL, `ismousufconnected` INTEGER NOT NULL, `comment` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordcount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `araone` TEXT, `aratwo` TEXT, `arathree` TEXT, `arafour` TEXT, `arafive` TEXT, `en` TEXT NOT NULL, `bn` TEXT NOT NULL, `in` TEXT NOT NULL, `ur` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `juz` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`root_a` TEXT, `lemma_a` TEXT, `araword` TEXT, `surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `token` INTEGER NOT NULL, `words` TEXT, `tag` TEXT NOT NULL, `propone` TEXT, `proptwo` TEXT, `form` TEXT, `lemma` TEXT, `root` TEXT, `gendernumber` TEXT, `type` TEXT, `cases` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `details` TEXT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`chapterno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `verseno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `token` INTEGER NOT NULL, `root_a` TEXT, `form` TEXT, `thulathibab` TEXT, `tag` TEXT, `details` TEXT, `POS` TEXT, `tense` TEXT, `voice` TEXT, `lemma_b` TEXT, `root_b` TEXT, `gendernumber` TEXT, `mood_kananumbers` TEXT, `kana_mood` TEXT, `lemma_a` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `page` INTEGER NOT NULL, `quarter` INTEGER NOT NULL, `hizb` INTEGER NOT NULL, `juz` INTEGER NOT NULL, `qurantext` TEXT NOT NULL, `passage_no` INTEGER NOT NULL, `has_prostration` INTEGER NOT NULL, `translation` TEXT NOT NULL, `en_transliteration` TEXT NOT NULL, `en_jalalayn` TEXT NOT NULL, `en_arberry` TEXT NOT NULL, `ar_irab_two` TEXT NOT NULL, `ur_jalalayn` TEXT NOT NULL, `ur_junagarhi` TEXT NOT NULL, `tafsir_kathir` TEXT NOT NULL, `docid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, FOREIGN KEY(`surah`) REFERENCES `chaptersana`(`chapterid`) ON UPDATE NO ACTION ON DELETE CASCADE )

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`surah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `ayah` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordno` INTEGER NOT NULL, `wordcount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `araone` TEXT, `aratwo` TEXT, `arathree` TEXT, `arafour` TEXT, `arafive` TEXT, `tagone` TEXT, `tagtwo` TEXT, `tagthree` TEXT, `tagfour` TEXT, `tagfive` TEXT, `rootaraone` TEXT, `rootaratwo` TEXT, `rootarathree` TEXT, `rootarafour` TEXT, `rootarafive` TEXT, `lemaraone` TEXT, `lemaratwo` TEXT, `lemarathree` TEXT, `lemarafour` TEXT, `lemarafive` TEXT, `lemma_b_one` TEXT, `form_one` TEXT, `form_two` TEXT, `form_three` TEXT, `form_four` TEXT, `form_five` TEXT, `detailsone` TEXT, `detailstwo` TEXT, `detailsthree` TEXT, `detailsfour` TEXT, `detailsfive` TEXT, `lemma_b_two` TEXT, `lemma_b_three` TEXT, `lemma_b_four` TEXT, `lemma_b_five` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `juz` INTEGER NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`header` TEXT, `verseno` TEXT NOT NULL, `chapterno` TEXT NOT NULL, `surahname` TEXT NOT NULL, `datetime` TEXT, `id` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL)

CREATE TABLE IF NOT EXISTS `${TABLE_NAME}` (`revelationnumber` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `serialnumber` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `namearabic` TEXT NOT NULL, `nameurdu` TEXT, `nameenglish` TEXT NOT NULL, `ismakki` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 1, `versescount` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `rukucount` INTEGER NOT NULL DEFAULT 0, `abjadname` TEXT NOT NULL, `arahsfall` TEXT NOT NULL, `versesparahdiv` TEXT, `sajdaverses` TEXT, `cumversescount` INTEGER NOT NULL, `chapterid` INTEGER PRIMARY KEY AUTOINCREMENT NOT NULL, `part_no` INTEGER NOT NULL)
